# Sacrificial Skill (Spell)
## Overview
[[Enchantment Spells|Enchantment]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[2nd Level Assassin Spells|Assassin 2]], [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[1st Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 1]], [[1st Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 1]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 1st-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 1]], [[BoXM 1st-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 1]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, M (a lock of hair taken from an unwilling humanoid)

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** Caster

**Duration:** 1 minute/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Vile Darkness (WotC)Â­, pg. 103

The caster gains a +5 bonus on all [[Knowledge (Domain)|Knowledge]] (religion) checks that have to do with sacrifices made to evil gods. See Sacrifices in Chapter 2 of the *Book of Vile Darkness* for the [[Knowledge (Domain)|Knowledge]] (religion) check DCs required to gain boons from evil gods.
